dsDescriptionValue.value: Precipitation-runoff and storage data for Star Creek watershed.

publicationCitation.value: Spencer, S.A., Silins, U., & Anderson, A.E. Precipitaton-runoff and storage dynamics in watersheds underlain by till and permeable bedrock in Alberta's Rocky Mountains. Water Resources Research. In Review.

files.description: Area weighted precipitation for Star Creek watershed.
files.label: Annual average precipitation.tab

dataFile.description: Area weighted precipitation for Star Creek watershed.

files.description: Dynamic storage calculated by the water balance method for Star West and Star East sub-watersheds.
files.label: Dynamic storage.tab

dataFile.description: Dynamic storage calculated by the water balance method for Star West and Star East sub-watersheds.

files.description: Event rise is the difference in specific discharge at the start of a precipitation event and specific discharge at the peak of the event. Event rise is calculated for dry and wet periods.
files.label: Event rise.csv

dataFile.description: Event rise is the difference in specific discharge at the start of a precipitation event and specific discharge at the peak of the event. Event rise is calculated for dry and wet periods.

files.description: Water table dynamics for three hillslope wells in Star Creek and daily precipitation data for the matching time period.
files.label: Hillslope wells.csv

dataFile.description: Water table dynamics for three hillslope wells in Star Creek and daily precipitation data for the matching time period.

files.description: Recession slopes and average discharge for night hours, on days with no rain, in July and August for four sub-watersheds in Star Creek watershed.
files.label: Recession analysis.csv

dataFile.description: Recession slopes and average discharge for night hours, on days with no rain, in July and August for four sub-watersheds in Star Creek watershed.

files.description: Winter precipitation and runoff dynamics for dry and wet autumns (seasonal antecedent conditions).
files.label: Winter precip-runoff ratios.csv

dataFile.description: Winter precipitation and runoff dynamics for dry and wet autumns (seasonal antecedent conditions).
